content:
I was wondering if this group (i.e. me :big_smile:) should have try and perf permissions, just so I don't have to bother someone every time :)

IIRC those perms are not "dangerous" and giving them is pretty uncontroversial, I figured I'd ask. I'm fine with having to request someone to start a perf run though
Even with just try permissions you can still do some damage to the rust infrastructure, as try builds have access to an S3 token for the bucket to store the artifacts in.
